label: lineOfCreditSpecifiedFinancialAccount
comment: The financing financial account, used for managing the line of credit, specified for this financing summary document.

rangeIncludes.comment: A financial account used internally by a bank to manage the line of credit granted to financing requesting party.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of financing related data that provides an overview of key points.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
